properties.name: Cliffs of Moher
properties.description: Dramatic 214m sea cliffs on Ireland's Wild Atlantic Way, absolutely iconic

properties.name: Giant's Causeway
properties.description: UNESCO site with 40,000 hexagonal basalt columns, Northern Ireland's most famous natural wonder

properties.name: Ring of Kerry
properties.description: Ireland's most scenic 160km coastal drive with rugged mountains and sandy beaches

properties.name: Skellig Michael
properties.description: Dramatic rocky island with ancient monastery, Star Wars filming location
